bool wxIsFileProtocol (const wxString &uri)
 Returns TRUE if the given URI should be handled by wxFileProto class because it starts with 'file:' and represent a file URI.
bool wxIsHTTPProtocol (const wxString &uri)
 Returns TRUE if the given URI should be handled by wxURL class because it starts with 'http:' and represent a HTTP URI.

 Returns TRUE if the given URI requires an Internet connection to be resolved.

 Returns a string with the file URI for the given filename.
wxInputStream * wxGetInputStreamFromURI (const wxString &uri)
 Returns a wxInputStream (no seek abilities) from the given URI (file: or http:) or NULL.
unsigned long wxGetSizeOfURI (const wxString &uri)
 Returns the size in bytes of the resource pointed by the given URI or zero.

#define wxDT_ABORT_DOWNLOAD (  msg   ) 
 

Value:

{                                      \
            wxLogUsrMsg(wxT("wxDownloadThread::Entry - ") +             \
                wxString(msg) + wxT(" - DOWNLOAD ABORTED !!!"));        \
            m_bSuccess = FALSE;                                         \
            m_mStatus.Lock();                                           \
            m_nStatus = wxDTS_WAITING;                                  \
            m_mStatus.Unlock();                                         \
            wxPostEvent(m_pHandler, updatevent);                        \
            continue;                                                   \
    }
